entry.title: first things first
entry.content:
it's been a while since i got this site up and running but hadn't had any idea about what to do in here. there was a blur idea of something like keeping a journal or writing poems/stories but well i aint no poet and them words dont rhyme themselves. so, i'll be keeping a journal which'll rather focus on what i learnt that day.

starting tomorrow i'll be uploading a blog daily about my journey of learning c++ . basically i'll be teaching what i learnt that day.or perhaps just rant about what i didnt understand.

off i go, see you tomorrow.
